verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD קִרְא֣וּ <WH7121> call בִּשְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <WH3045> make known בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> among the people עֲלִילוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5949> his deeds
שִֽׁירוּ־ <WH7891> Sing ל֭וֹ זַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> unto him sing psalms ל֑וֹ שִׂ֝֗יחוּ <WH7878> unto him talk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> ye of all his wondrous works

הִֽ֭תְהַלְלוּ <WH1984> Glory בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> ye in his holy יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <WH8055> of them rejoice לֵ֤ב ׀ <WH3820> let the heart מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י <WH1245> that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
דִּרְשׁ֣וּ <WH1875> Seek יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD וְעֻזּ֑וֹ <WH5797> and his strength בַּקְּשׁ֖וּ <WH1245> seek פָנָ֣יו <WH6440> his face תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> evermore

זִכְר֗וּ <WH2142> Remember נִפְלְאוֹתָ֥יו <WH6381> his marvellous works אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> that he hath done מֹ֝פְתָ֗יו <WH4159> his wonders וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <WH4941> and the judgments פִֽיו׃ <WH6310> of his mouth
זֶ֭רַע <WH2233> O ye seed אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> of Abraham עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> his servant בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> ye children יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <WH972> his chosen
ה֭וּא <WH1931> He יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> He [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> [are] in all the earth מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃ <WH4941> his judgments

זָכַ֣ר <WH2142> He hath remembered לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> his covenant דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> the word צִ֝וָּ֗ה <WH6680> [which] he commanded לְאֶ֣לֶף <WH505> to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> generations
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which כָּ֭רַת <WH3772> Which [covenant] he made אֶת־ <WH854> with אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> with Abraham וּשְׁב֖וּעָת֣וֹ <WH7621> and his oath לְיִשְׂחָֽק׃ <WH3446> unto Isaac

וַיַּֽעֲמִידֶ֣הָ <WH5975> And confirmed לְיַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> the same unto Jacob לְחֹ֑ק <WH2706> for a law לְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> [and] to Israel בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [for] an everlasting

לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> Saying לְךָ֗ אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> Unto thee will I give אֶת־ <WH853> אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan חֶ֝֗בֶל <WH2256> the lot נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃ <WH5159> of your inheritance
בִּֽ֭הְיוֹתָם <WH1961> were only מְתֵ֣י <WH4962> When they were [but] a few men מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> in number כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט <WH4592> yea very few וְגָרִ֥ים <WH1481> and strangers בָּֽהּ׃

וַֽ֭יִּתְהַלְּכוּ <WH1980> When they went מִגּ֣וֹי <WH1471> from one nation אֶל־ <WH413> to גּ֑וֹי <WH1471> nation מִ֝מַּמְלָכָ֗ה <WH4467> to another from [one] kingdom אֶל־ <WH413> about עַ֥ם <WH5971> people אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> to another

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הִנִּ֣יחַ <WH3240> He suffered אָדָ֣ם <WH120> no man לְעָשְׁקָ֑ם <WH6231> to do them wrong וַיּ֖וֹכַח <WH3198> yea he reproved עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> their sakes מְלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> kings
אַֽל־ <WH408> no תִּגְּע֥וּ <WH5060> [Saying] Touch בִמְשִׁיחָ֑י <WH4899> not mine anointed וְ֝לִנְבִיאַי <WH5030> and do my prophets אַל־ <WH408> no תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7489> no harm

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> Moreover he called רָ֭עָב <WH7458> for a famine עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the land כָּֽל־ <WH3605> the whole מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> the whole staff לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> of bread שָׁבָֽר׃ <WH7665> he brake
שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> He sent לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> before אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> a man לְ֝עֶ֗בֶד <WH5650> for a servant נִמְכַּ֥ר <WH4376> [who] was sold יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> them [even] Joseph
עִנּ֣וּ <WH6031> they hurt בַכֶּ֣בֶל <WH3525> with fetters [רַגְלָיו כ] (רַגְלֹ֑ו <WH7272> be able to endure ק) בַּ֝רְזֶ֗ל <WH1270> in iron בָּ֣אָה <WH935> was laid נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> he
עַד־ <WH5704> Until עֵ֥ת <WH6256> Until the time בֹּֽא־ <WH935> came דְבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> that his word אִמְרַ֖ת <WH565> the word יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְרָפָֽתְהוּ׃ <WH6884> tried

שָׁ֣לַח <WH7971> sent מֶ֭לֶךְ <WH4428> The king וַיַּתִּירֵ֑הוּ <WH5425> and loosed מֹשֵׁ֥ל <WH4910> him [even] the ruler עַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH5971> of the people וַֽיְפַתְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <WH6605> and let him go free
שָׂמ֣וֹ <WH7760> He made אָד֣וֹן <WH113> him lord לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> of his house וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל <WH4910> and ruler בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all קִנְיָנֽוֹ׃ <WH7075> of all his substance
לֶאְסֹ֣ר <WH631> To bind שָׂרָ֣יו <WH8269> his princes בְּנַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> at his pleasure וּזְקֵנָ֥יו <WH2205> and teach his senators יְחַכֵּֽם׃ <WH2449> wisdom
וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> also came יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Israel מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וְ֝יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> and Jacob גָּ֣ר <WH1481> sojourned בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land חָֽם׃ <WH2526> of Ham
וַיֶּ֣פֶר <WH6509> And he increased אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> his people מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> greatly וַ֝יַּֽעֲצִמֵהוּ <WH6105> and made them stronger מִצָּרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> than their enemies
הָפַ֣ךְ <WH2015> He turned לִ֭בָּם <WH3820> their heart לִשְׂנֹ֣א <WH8130> to hate עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people לְ֝הִתְנַכֵּ֗ל <WH5230> to deal subtilly בַּעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> with his servants
שָׁ֭לַח <WH7971> He sent מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> his servant אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> [and] Aaron אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom בָּֽחַר־ <WH977> whom he had chosen בּֽוֹ׃
שָֽׂמוּ־ <WH7760> They shewed בָ֭ם דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> acts אֹתוֹתָ֑יו <WH226> his wondrous וּ֝מֹפְתִ֗ים <WH4159> among them and wonders בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חָֽם׃ <WH2526> of Ham

שָׁ֣לַֽח <WH7971> He sent חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <WH2822> darkness וַיַּחְשִׁ֑ךְ <WH2821> and made it dark וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not מָ֝ר֗וּ <WH4784> and they rebelled אֶת־ <WH854> against [דְּבָרָוו כ] (דְּבָרֹֽו׃ <WH1697> act ק)
הָפַ֣ךְ <WH2015> He turned אֶת־ <WH853> מֵימֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4325> their waters לְדָ֑ם <WH1818> into blood וַ֝יָּ֗מֶת <WH4191> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> דְּגָתָֽם׃ <WH1710> their fish
שָׁרַ֣ץ <WH8317> in abundance אַרְצָ֣ם <WH776> Their land צְפַרְדְּעִ֑ים <WH6854> frogs בְּ֝חַדְרֵ֗י <WH2315> in the chambers מַלְכֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4428> of their kings
אָ֭מַר <WH559> He spake וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and there came עָרֹ֑ב <WH6157> divers sorts of flies כִּ֝נִּ֗ים <WH3654> [and] lice בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> in all their coasts
נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> He gave גִּשְׁמֵיהֶ֣ם <WH1653> for rain בָּרָ֑ד <WH1259> them hail אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> fire לֶהָב֣וֹת <WH3852> [and] flaming בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> in their land
וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> He smote גַּ֭פְנָם <WH1612> their vines וּתְאֵנָתָ֑ם <WH8384> also and their fig trees וַ֝יְשַׁבֵּ֗ר <WH7665> and brake עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> the trees גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> of their coasts
אָ֭מַר <WH559> He spake וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came אַרְבֶּ֑ה <WH697> and the locusts וְ֝יֶ֗לֶק <WH3218> and caterpillers וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> without מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> and that without number

וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> And did eat up כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> all the herbs בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> in their land וַ֝יֹּ֗אכַל <WH398> and devoured פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> the fruit אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <WH127> of their ground

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> He smote כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> also all the firstborn בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> in their land רֵ֝אשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> the chief לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all אוֹנָֽם׃ <WH202> of all their strength

וַֽ֭יּוֹצִיאֵם <WH3318> He brought them forth בְּכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> also with silver וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> and gold וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> there בִּשְׁבָטָ֣יו <WH7626> [person] among their tribes כּוֹשֵֽׁל׃ <WH3782> and [there was] not one feeble

שָׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> was glad מִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> Egypt בְּצֵאתָ֑ם <WH3318> when they departed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> of them נָפַ֖ל <WH5307> of them fell פַּחְדָּ֣ם <WH6343> for the fear עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and
פָּרַ֣שׂ <WH6566> He spread עָנָ֣ן <WH6051> a cloud לְמָסָ֑ךְ <WH4539> for a covering וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> and fire לְהָאִ֥יר <WH215> to give light לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> in the night
שָׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> [The people] asked וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> and he brought שְׂלָ֑ו <WH7958> quails וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> them with the bread שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> of heaven יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽם׃ <WH7646> and satisfied

פָּ֣תַח <WH6605> He opened צ֭וּר <WH6697> the rock וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <WH2100> gushed out מָ֑יִם <WH4325> and the waters הָ֝לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> they ran בַּצִּיּ֥וֹת <WH6723> in the dry places נָהָֽר׃ <WH5104> [like] a river
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זָ֭כַר <WH2142> For he remembered אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> promise קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> his holy אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> [and] Abraham עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5650> his servant
וַיּוֹצִ֣א <WH3318> And he brought forth עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> his people בְשָׂשׂ֑וֹן <WH8342> with joy בְּ֝רִנָּ֗ה <WH7440> with gladness אֶת־ <WH853> בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <WH972> [and] his chosen

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> And gave לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> also אַרְצ֣וֹת <WH776> them the lands גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the heathen וַעֲמַ֖ל <WH5999> the labour לְאֻמִּ֣ים <WH3816> of the people יִירָֽשׁוּ׃ <WH3423> and they inherited

בַּעֲב֤וּר ׀ <WH5668> So יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> That they might observe חֻ֭קָּיו <WH2706> his statutes וְתוֹרֹתָ֥יו <WH8451> his laws יִנְצֹ֗רוּ <WH5341> and keep הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
